meanings.definition: Automatically load (a program or data) into a computer's memory.
meanings.sent1: The game will autoload your progress so you can continue from where you left off.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to set the settings to autoload the updates for smooth operation.
meanings.sent3: I wish my fridge could autoload groceries when I run out of milk.
meanings.sent4: Her smile autoloads happiness into everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The magic wand can autoload spells with just a wave.

meanings.definition: Load (a program or data) into a computer's memory automatically when it is needed.
meanings.sent1: The software will autoload the necessary files as soon as you open it.
meanings.sent2: You can configure the system to autoload essential programs upon startup.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a car that can autoload fuel when it's running low.
meanings.sent4: His words autoload comfort into her during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's suit can autoload different tools for various missions.
